cu.explanation_en: Setting the RRC layer log level to an invalid enum like 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper RRC layer logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RA response window to -1 is out of the valid range and may cause RACH configuration failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RA 回應視窗設定為 -1 超出有效範圍，可能導致 RACH 配置失敗。
